problem_text:
4.4. Potential theory for surfaces with cusps
A detailed theory of boundary integral equations for harmonic and elastic
singe and double layer potentials on curves with exterior and interior cusps
was constructed in [93].
Problem. Develop a theory of multidimensional boundary integral equations
for domains with inner and outer cusps.
First results concerning the multidimensional case can be found in [84]-[86].
